unittitle_ssm: Association for Erecting a Monument to the 11,500 Martyrs of the British Prison Ships bylaws and minutes
abstract_ssm: One bound volume containing bylaws and minutes of the Brooklyn-based Association for Erecting a Monument to the 11,500 Martyrs of the British Prison Ships, spanning 1852 to 1855.
